Making Instructions
Make the simple syrup by adding the water, sugar and pinch of salt to a saucepan located underneath the stove area.
Place the saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring the mixture until the sugar has fully dissolved.
Using the blender found next to the fridge, combine the warm mixture from the saucepan and the cubed pineapples and blend until smooth.
Cover and place in refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
Press sorbet on the control panel, and then the start button.
Pour your pineapple mixture through the top spout and cover with the measuring cup cap. Let mix until thickened and enjoy your sorbet!
